keyword: calories in chick fil a sauce
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Sauce
meta_description: Learn calories in Chick-fil-A sauce per standard packet, including full nutrition facts like fat, carbs, sodium, and quick serving tips for your meal.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) packet of Chick-fil-A dipping sauce; creamy blend of honey mustard, barbecue, and Polynesian flavors.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, restaurant preparation, and exact serving size. Check Chick-fil-A app or packaging for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One packet of Chick-fil-A sauce contains 140 calories and 13g of fat.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with restaurant or packaged items.

tweaks.label: Add to grilled chicken (no extra changes to sauce)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Chick-fil-A sauce packet?
faqs.a: Approximately 140 calories per standard 1 oz packet.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in Chick-fil-A sauce?
faqs.a: 13g total fat, including 2g saturated fat, per packet.

faqs.q: Does Chick-fil-A sauce have sugar or carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, 6g carbs and 5g sugars per packet, with 0g fiber.

faqs.q: Is Chick-fil-A sauce high in sodium?
faqs.a: It has 135mg sodium per packet, about 6% of daily value.

faqs.q: Can I find lower-calorie alternatives to Chick-fil-A sauce?
faqs.a: Opt for lighter versions like their honey roasted BBQ (45 kcal) or use half a packet to cut calories.
